name: MEC Aquanot 20L Pannier - Unisex
description: Fully waterproof and insanely rugged for wet-weather commuting and touring. The secret is the fabric, laminated on both sides and welded at the seams, it as tough as a truck tarp, but still has some suppleness. Top pocket and pockets inside help keep the contents organized and easy to find. The hardware makes is a simple matter to pop on and off your bike rack.Made of 600-denier laminated tarp fabric that's completely waterproof, tough, but still supple.210-denier spindrift collar is laminated and has a rolltop closure and a drawstring.Floating lid is height adjustable.Welded seams keep water out.Top pocket, sleeves for a lock and a pump and a detachable zippered pocket for carrying your keys and wallet.Rixen and Kaul mounting hardware has spring-loaded top hooks that fit 8-16mm diameter racks.Eyelets on attachment hardware let you add your own shoulder strap.Lower hook adjusts for tension and can be flipped to mount on left or right side.Reflective accents and slots to attach a bike light.Sold singly.
